Question 29 
 
 
Digital Electronics  
 
The maximum clock frequency in MHz of a 4-stage ripple counter, utilizing flip-flops, with each flip-flop 
having a propagation delay of 20 ns, is _______. (round off to one decimal place). 
Ans. 
 12.5 (Range : 12.3 to 12.7)
